extends java.lang.Object
implements com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.VectorialDriver, com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.driver.ObjectDriver, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.BoundedShapes, com.iver.utiles.IPersistence, com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.IDataSourceListener

The class AddEventThemeDriver allows to create a new FLayer from a gvSIG DataSource.

jmorell
